answers.answer: You poor thing!!! Did they due a sono??? Or did they just feel with their hands. You might not be able to carry full term with hbp. Your in good hands though.

The ultrasound said he was a pound over weight. But if I go off of me delivering 2 weeks earlier then he is the right size lol. And my high bp has been pretty controlled with medication and dieting  ... I'm trying everything I can to keep this boy in for as long as I can lol.
Sorry but bumpppp ... I really wanna know If anyone has been in a similar situation or would know how the Dr would be able to tell I he's big cuz the GD or cuz I'm 2 weeks early

If hes big from the gd he will weigh more than he should but be developing internally at the right rate for his gestational age. If he is truely two weeks farther along then his over all growth and development will be that much farther along. I hope this helps
Oh okay that makes sense. I didn't think of it like that. Ill have to ask the Dr if he is developing right for his age when I go in next week. Thanks :)

question: So I've been seeing a high risk doctor due to my high bp and gestational diabetes. I thought Iwas due January first but yesterday the dr said Iwas mesuring about 2 weeks early. How do they know if Ishould be due earlier or if he is just a big baby due to the gestational diabetes??
title: big babbby ?
